## jsonify-storage package

Jsonify the payload for local and session storage.

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [JSONStore](./jsonify-storage.jsonstore.md) | Wrapper of the native <code>Storage</code>. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [local](./jsonify-storage.local.md) | Wrapper of <code>localStorage</code>. |
|  [session](./jsonify-storage.session.md) | Wrapper of <code>sessionStorage</code>. |
